page.title: 04Parochial Church Council
page.content: The Parochial Church Council comprises the following people; {The Rector}is in overall charge of church matters in the area and is the priest who conducts church services. He is responsible to the Bishop of the Diocese. {A Churchwarden}organises the practical matters such as who will read in church each sunday. {A Verger}looks after the well-being of the church building and keeps the keys to the church. {The Treasurer}looks after the money given during a service. {The Covenant Secretary}accounts for the money people contribute to the church for items such as the building of a new roof.
